headline: Corpay Appoints New Chief Financial Officer
summary: ATLANTA, June 10, 2025--Corpay, Inc. (NYSE: CPAY), a leading global business payments company ("Corpay"), today announced the appointment of Peter Walker as Chief Financial Officer ("CFO"), effective July 21, 2025.
